DOC.brief_summary: This trial aim compare effect Danshen-Jiang-Fu Granule prepare Danshen ( Salvia Miltiorrhiza ) different produce area ( Shandong Sichuan ) relief primary dysmenorrhea .
DOC.brief_title: Danshen-Jiang-Fu Granule Prepared Danshen From Different Producing Areas Primary Dysmenorrhea
DOC.criteria: meet diagnostic criterion primary dysmenorrhea Primary Dysmenorrhea Consensus Guideline ; meet diagnostic criterion Hanningxueyu ( blood stasis due cold accumulation ) Zheng accord Gynecology Chinese medicine ; regular menstrual cycle last 21 35 day , menstruation last 3 9 day last 6 month ; course dysmenorrhea 6 month ; experience menstrual pain score vary 3cm 6cm 10cm VAS baseline menstrual period ( one period prior present menstrual period treatment ) ; without history pregnancy ; agreement inform consent work phone . history abdominal surgery ; acute chronic painful condition diagnose suspect ; use hormonal contraceptive , intrauterine device ; use analgetic drug analgetic treatment last 2 week ; know allergy Danshen ( Salvia Miltiorrhiza ) , Paojiang ( Roasted Ginger ) , Xiangfu ( Rhizoma Cyperi ) Wuyao ( Lindera Aggregata ) ; prone allergy daily life ; complete treatment adherence protocol ; attend trial last 3 month .
